long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will only be available while browsing Filelist. It will allow you to use 3 filters on the current page:
1. Only Freeleech - this will filter out every row of the current table that is not a freeleech
2. Highlight - this will change the background color of each row, according to the number of downloads (default settings are: rows over 20,000 downloads will have a red background, over 15,000 - purple, over 10,000 blue, and over 5,000 green)
3. With over 5,000 downloads - this will only display rows in the table that have over 5,000 downloads

You can change the settings for 2 and 3 from the Settings page.
